title: Most children ever live in conflict zones: report
text:
Most children ever live in conflict zones: report 6:30am EST - 01:58 
A report from Save the Children reveals that 350 million children now live in conflict zones, many of them subjected to grave violations such as killing, sexual violence and recruitment as soldiers.   
A report from Save the Children reveals that 350 million children now live in conflict zones, many of them subjected to grave violations such as killing, sexual violence and recruitment as soldiers.  //reut.rs/2svVT6r
